USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED: The user is not authorized to enter.
USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: There is already a user with the email {email}.
VENDOR_NOT_EXISTS: The seller you are looking for does not exists or is not activated.
FILE_FORMAT_NOT_SUPPORTED: The file format is not supported.
ROLE_NOT_FOUND: The role with id {id} does not exist.
ROLE_ALREADY_EXISTS: The role with name {name} already exists.
